input.name: __EVENTVALIDATION
input.script: var A006='This file extension is not allowed. Allowed file extension(s) are '.doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx, .pdf, .png, .jpg, .jpeg, .gif, .bmp, .tif, .tiff, .mp3, .mp4, .wav, .wmv, .mov'. Please select a file with allowed extensions and try again.';var A009='The file to upload cannot exceed 25 MB.';var A010='The file selected by you contains virus and hence cannot be uploaded.';

input.name: hdnSubmit

div.div: What would you like to submit?

input.style: min-width: 100px;width: 161px; float:left; margin-right:3px; background-color: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #abadb3; height:18px;

input.value: This file extension is not allowed. Allowed file extension(s) are '.doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx, .pdf, .png, .jpg, .jpeg, .gif, .bmp, .tif, .tiff, .mp3, .mp4, .wav, .wmv, .mov'. Please select a file with allowed extensions and try again.

div.div:
Tell us who you are
(Select one or more)

span.span: Charter Oak Unified School District Student
Charter Oak Unified School District Parent/Guardian
Charter Oak Unified School District Employee

fieldset.legend:
How can we contact you?
To receive a personalized response, please enter your name and at least one method of contact. If you leave this section blank, then we will not be able to respond to your message. If you would like to receive a response but keep your identity hidden from us, enter your email address and select 'Hide your contact information from the district.'

input.label: Hide your contact information from the district

div.p: If you choose to ‘Hide your contact information from the district’ the system will securely send your message to Charter Oak Unified School District without revealing your identity. However, Let's Talk!'s technology allows them to respond to your message.

div.div: Enter the characters as shown in the image

label.style: left: -10000px; top: auto; width: 1px; height: 1px; overflow: hidden; position: absolute;

div.label: Enter the characters as shown in the image

input.name: cap
input.aria-label: Captcha Image - Enter the characters as seen in the image

div.span: K12 Insight Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

div.div:
You've chosen to send this message anonymously. This means we won't be able to follow up with you directly.
We value both your candid feedback and privacy. If a message is received that poses a serious risk or threat, we may ask our Let's Talk! vendor to supply information collected about the author.
